title: I Built a Custom Keyboard!
description: I decided it was time to switch to a new keyboard setup to better my software development skills as well as prevent long term physical effects of programming for long periods of time.

title: My Transition from VSC*de to NeoVim
description: My experience with transitioning from VSC*de to NeoVim. This include setting up NeoVim, lazy.nvim, Mason, and other plugins that help my development cycle. Thank you to ThePrimeagen for providing guides to help me through this!
